alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 8:07PM MST until August 11 at 1:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. State route 238 is closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 804 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain fell. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Maricopa County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
